languages.text: Офицерская палуба атакована неизвестным противником, и архмилитант Морт отправился прокладывать дорогу до лифта, ведущего на верхние палубы. Офицер все еще не вернулся — самое время выяснить, что стало причиной этой задержки.

traits.locale_text: Офицерская палуба атакована неизвестным противником, и архимилитант Морт отправился прокладывать дорогу до лифта, ведущего на верхние палубы. Офицер все еще не вернулся — самое время выяснить, что стало причиной этой задержки.

languages.text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.
languages.original_text: Офицерская палуба атакована неизвестным противником, и архмилитант Морт отправился прокладывать дорогу до лифта, ведущего на верхние палубы. Офицер все еще не вернулся — самое время выяснить, что стало причиной этой задержки.

traits.locale_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the elevator leading to the upper decks. The officer hasn't returned yet, so it's time to find out what has caused the delay.

The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

languages.text: Das Offiziersdeck wird von einem unbekannten Feind angegriffen, und Erzmilitant Mort ist gegangen, um den Weg zu dem Aufzug freizumachen, der zu den oberen Decks führt. Der Offizier ist noch nicht zurückgekehrt, und es ist an der Zeit, den Grund für die Verzögerung zu ermitteln.
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: Das Offiziersdeck wird von einem unbekannten Feind angegriffen, und Erzmilitant Mort ist gegangen, um den Weg zu dem Aufzug freizumachen, der zu den oberen Decks führt. Der Offizier ist noch nicht zurückgekehrt, und es ist an der Zeit, den Grund für die Verzögerung zu ermitteln.

languages.text: Le pont des officiers est attaqué par un ennemi inconnu, l'archimilitant Mort est donc parti dégager la voie jusqu'à l'ascenseur menant aux ponts supérieurs. L'officier n'étant pas encore revenu, il est temps d'aller voir ce qui le retient.
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: Le pont des officiers est attaqué par un ennemi inconnu, l'archimilitant Mort est donc parti dégager la voie jusqu'à l'ascenseur menant aux ponts supérieurs. L'officier n'étant pas encore revenu, il est temps d'aller voir ce qui le retient.

languages.text: 军官甲板遭到了未知敌人的袭击，首席战士莫特已经离开甲板，前去清理通往上层甲板的道路，然而，他还没有回来，得去弄清楚他究竟被什么事情耽搁了。
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: 军官甲板遭到了未知敌人的袭击，首席战士莫特已经离开甲板，前去清理通往上层甲板的道路，然而，他还没有回来，得去弄清楚他究竟被什么事情耽搁了。

languages.text: 士官デッキが正体不明の敵から攻撃を受けているため、アーク・ミリタントのモートが上層デッキに通じるリフトへの道を確保しにいった。士官はまだ戻らない。遅れの原因を突き止める必要がある。
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: 士官デッキが正体不明の敵から攻撃を受けているため、アーク・ミリタントのモートが上層デッキに通じるリフトへの道を確保しにいった。士官はまだ戻らない。遅れの原因を突き止める必要がある。

languages.text: Un enemigo desconocido ataca la cubierta de oficiales, por lo que el Archimilitante Mort ha recibido orden de despejar el camino al ascensor que lleva a las cubiertas superiores. Aún no ha vuelto, así que es necesario investigar el motivo del retraso.
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: Un enemigo desconocido ataca la cubierta de oficiales, por lo que el Archimilitante Mort ha recibido orden de despejar el camino al ascensor que lleva a las cubiertas superiores. Aún no ha vuelto, así que es necesario investigar el motivo del retraso.

languages.text: Subay güvertesi bilinmeyen bir düşmanın saldırısı altında. Bu yüzden de Başmilitan Mort, üst güvertelere çıkan asansörün yolunu açmak üzere ayrıldı. Subay hâlâ dönmedi. Neden geciktiğini öğrenme zamanı.
languages.original_text: The officers' deck is under attack by an unknown enemy, so Arch-Militant Mort has left to clear the way to the lift leading to the upper decks. The officer has not returned yet, so it is time to find out the cause of the delay.

traits.locale_text: Subay güvertesi bilinmeyen bir düşmanın saldırısı altında. Bu yüzden de Başmilitan Mort, üst güvertelere çıkan asansörün yolunu açmak üzere ayrıldı. Subay hâlâ dönmedi. Neden geciktiğini öğrenme zamanı.
